Local Information

Workshop Dinner

The ALTA Workshop Dinner will be held at Annapurna Indian Restaurant. Costs will be approximately $30 per person.

Accommodation

Backpacker Style Accomodation

  • The Pickled Frog- (Dorms from $23, private rooms from $60 per person and $60 for a double - twin share)
  • Central City Hobart - (Dorms from $23 per person, private rooms from $55 per person single and $69 for a double - twin share)

 

Hotel Style Accomodation

  • Somerset on the Pier
  • Lenna of Hobart
  • Salamanca Inn
  • Grand Mercure
  • Quest Waterfront Hotel
  • Hotel Grand Chancellor
  • St. Ives Apartments Motel Hobart

 

Useful Travel Information and ICT Centre

  • Tasmanian ICT Centre
  • Discovery Tasmanian
  • Pure Tasmanian
  • Hobart eGuide
  • Hobart airport

 

Enquiries

The Australasian Language Technology Workshop is being organised by ALTA, the Australasian Language Technology Association.

For any comments or questions about the workshop please contact the organizers (workshop AT alta DOT asn DOT au).
